concepts.name: story-0
concepts.speech: My name is Archibald Jefferson King.

concepts.name: story-1
concepts.speech: Would you like to hear my story?

concepts.name: story-2
concepts.speech: My dad fought in the Yeast War

concepts.name: story-2a
concepts.speech: But he took an arrow in the knee and died

concepts.name: story-3
concepts.speech: My ma ran off with the blacksmith's mule after child birth

concepts.name: story-4
concepts.speech: So I spent my earliest years in an orphanage

concepts.name: story-5
concepts.speech: Cletus, another orphan, stole all my candy

concepts.name: story-5a
concepts.speech: Well, except for the lemon-flavoured ones

concepts.name: story-6
concepts.speech: Cletus set loose our pet moose and blamed me

concepts.name: story-7
concepts.speech: I got kicked out and have been on the streets ever since

concepts.name: beg-1
concepts.speech: I'm so hungry...

concepts.name: beg-2
concepts.speech: I'm tired. So tired...

concepts.name: beg-3
concepts.speech: *sob*

concepts.name: beg-4
concepts.speech: Please. PLEASE. please...

concepts.name: polite-1
concepts.speech: Hello! D'you have any spare coins?

concepts.name: polite-2
concepts.speech: G'day! Could you spare a dime?

concepts.name: polite-3
concepts.speech: My name is Archibald. D'you have any change for a meal?

concepts.name: polite-4
concepts.speech: *smiles*

concepts.name: polite-5
concepts.speech: Those are some nice shoes!

concepts.name: polite-6
concepts.speech: Hiya! Any chance you could spare some money for a sandwich?
